item.title: Keir Starmer has said the UK will recognise a Palestinian state in September unless Israel has taken real steps to end the "appalling situation" in Gaza — but Netanyahu has accused him of "rewarding Hamas". #DonaldTrump #KeirStarmer #Israel #Gaza #Netanya
